oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Forrest Monument Minutes Book missing pages
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Forrest, Nathan Bedford; Forrest monument; Forrest Park; Niehaus, Charles H.; statues;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Missing pages from the minutes book acquired by the contributor over 20 years ago from a Civil War relics dealer in Little Rock, AR. Page 9-10 entry dated August 9, 1898 concerns subscriptions for the monument fund drive. Page 11 entry dated January 15, 1901 mentions a letter from the Hon. Charles Seall of Rosedale, MS who suggested that the association ask prominent citizens in all the counties to help solicit subscriptions for the monument fund drive. Page 12 entry dated May 1, 1901 mentions removal of members for non-attendance and Gen. Gordon gave a report on the progress of the design phase of the monument.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Muska, Becky
